timeline.bodyText: Maybe we could add a link to our github page or put the support email here just in case they want to know more? e.g. what time the maintenance ends or that sorta thing
timeline.author: madanalogy

@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@ +

+ TEAMMATES server is currently undergoing some maintenance.

replies.bodyText:
GitHub page is not the way we communicate to end users
Putting support email may be a valid idea, but how much answer can user get even if we put it there?
Maintenance end time can't be predicted. It's also quite an overkill if that's part of application config.
We also might want to put extra messages that really depend on case-by-case basis. It may not be a simple text field that can be fit inside a string type.

Might as well just edit this HTML file as necessary before deploying.
replies.author: wkurniawan07

replies.bodyText: Yup, let's keep it flexible. I can quickly write the message and deploy.
replies.author: damithc
